body:
Once you have installed hdhomerun_config, instructions here:[Linux HDHomeRun installation guide](http://www.silicondust.com/support/hdhomerun/downloads/linux/), download the hdhomerun.sh script and run it.  You may have to add execute permissions with `chmod +x`.  Use `tar -zxvf {file.tar.gz}` To extract the script.
On the rare occasion it may require to be run twice (if nothing shows up in your Live TV folder the first time).

Afterwards add `~/Videos/Live TV` to your video file in XBMC.

You should now be able to stream individual channels via XBMC by opening Videos>Live TV>'Your Channel'
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Simple bash script to scan your HDHomeRun and create strm files for use with XBMC (intended for use with Linux)
name: Hdhomerun
